The large bot mumbles something incoherent and continues forward even though he was pinned. His large size (width-wise as well as length-wise) gave him enough weigth to make it very hard for his foe to keep him in place. He was completely unaware of any other bots around him.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jordan Guthrie <gunthers8@n...> wrote:
> ::Repugnus::
> Repugnus watched the bot stumble by.
> "You dare...you dare to just walk by me without addressing....How doare 
> you exhaust pipe. " He said.
> He thought of using his pincers to send and distort colors, but thr 
> drunk bot would probably have no affect to it already.  He rand at the 
> bot trying to pin him against the wall with his pincer.
> 
> Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> 
> > ::::
> >

> > into a wall but rights himself, and stumbles further down the steps.
